item.title: My Survey Paper
item.description: Hello. In my 3rd year of studying at Nazarbayev University, I did a survey paper for a “Research Methods” course. This is my initial attempt at trying to write a paper. I was quite naive when writing it, but the experience proved to be priceless. The title of my paper is “Survey: Current Web Application Security trends in Cyber Security Attacks and the Difficulties of Implementing a NGFW to Defend Against Them”.
item.content:
Hello. In my 3rd year of studying at Nazarbayev University, I did a survey paper for a “Research Methods” course.

This is my initial attempt at trying to write a paper. I was quite naive when writing it, but the experience proved to be priceless.

The title of my paper is “Survey: Current Web Application Security trends in Cyber Security Attacks and the Difficulties of Implementing a NGFW to Defend Against Them”. You can read the paper here.
